text:
Module Zad2
    Sub main()
        Dim b1, b2 As Double
        Dim op As String
        Console.Write("Unesite 1. broj: ")
        b1 = Console.ReadLine()
        Console.Write("Unesite 2. broj: ")
        b2 = Console.ReadLine()
        Console.Write("Odaberite matematiku operaciju [+,-,*,/]: ")
        op = Console.ReadLine()
        If op = "+" Then
            Console.WriteLine("{0}+{1}={2}", b1, b2, b1 + b2)
        Else
            If op = "-" Then
                Console.WriteLine("{0}-{1}={2}", b1, b2, b1 - b2)
            Else
                If op = "*" Then
                    Console.WriteLine("{0}*{1}={2}", b1, b2, b1 * b2)
                Else
                    If b2 = 0 Then
                        Console.WriteLine("Zabranjeno djeljenje s nulom!")
                    Else
                        Console.WriteLine("{0}/{1}={2}", b1, b2, b1 / b2)
                    End If
                End If
            End If
        End If
        Console.ReadLine()
    End Sub
End Module
